Class WeightedGraph<V>

java.lang.Object
WeightedGraph<V>
Type Parameters:
V - The type of data held by the vertices.
public class WeightedGraph<V> extends Object
Represents a weighted graph.

    Constructs a weighted graph.

    • WeightedGraph

      Constructs a weighted graph.
      Parameters:
      directed - If true, the graph is directed. Otherwise, it is undirected.
